mapper.insert: INSERT INTO study (title, content, keywords, created_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{keywords}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.title, s.content, s.keywords, s.created_at, i.id AS image_id, i.study_id, i.image_url FROM study s LEFT JOIN image i ON s.id = i.study_id ORDER BY s.created_at DESC
SELECT s.id, s.title, s.content, s.keywords, s.created_at, i.id AS image_id, i.study_id, i.image_url FROM study s LEFT JOIN image i ON s.id = i.study_id WHERE s.id = #{id}

SELECT s.id, s.title, s.content, s.keywords, s.created_at, i.id AS image_id, i.study_id, i.image_url FROM study s LEFT JOIN image i ON s.id = i.study_id WHERE s.keywords LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY s.created_at DESC
